title: These are the Samsung phones in line for a One UI 7 update
description: One UI 7 is already here on the Galaxy S25 family and for many owners of older Samsung devices it’s now a matter of playing the waiting game for an update. Samsung has been pushing the release window down the road, at least as far as the Galaxy S24 generation is concerned, so we don’t really know what the release timeframe for the update looks like. What we can do, however, is compile a list that should be fairly exhaustive for all the recent Samsung devices that are eligible to eventually get a One UI 7 update. Galaxy S24 Ultra Galaxy S24+ Galaxy S24 Galaxy S24...

text: One UI 7 is already here on the Galaxy S25 family and for many owners of older Samsung devices it’s now a matter of playing the waiting game for an update. Samsung has been pushing the release window down the road, at least as far as the Galaxy S24 generation is concerned, so we don’t really know what the release timeframe for the update looks like. What we can do, however, is compile a list that should be fairly exhaustive for all the recent Samsung devices that are eligible to eventually get a One UI 7 update. Galaxy S24 Ultra Galaxy S24+ Galaxy S24 Galaxy S24 FE Galaxy S23 FE Galaxy S23 Ultra Galaxy S23+ Galaxy S23 Galaxy S22 Ultra Galaxy S22+ 5G Galaxy S22 5G Galaxy S21 FE Galaxy S21 Ultra Galaxy S21+ 5G Galaxy S21+ Galaxy S21 5G Galaxy S21 Galaxy Z Fold6 Galaxy Z Flip6 Galaxy Z Fold5 Galaxy Z Flip5 Galaxy Z Fold4 Galaxy Z Flip4 Galaxy Z Fold3 Galaxy Z Flip3 Galaxy A73 Galaxy A72 Galaxy A55 Galaxy A54 Galaxy A53 5G Galaxy A35 Galaxy A34 Galaxy A33 5G Galaxy A25 Galaxy A24 Galaxy A23 Galaxy A16 Galaxy A15 5G Galaxy A15 Galaxy A14 5G Galaxy A14 Galaxy A06 Galaxy A05s Galaxy A05 Galaxy M55 Galaxy M54 Galaxy M53 Galaxy M35 Galaxy M34 Galaxy M33 Galaxy M15 Galaxy F55 Galaxy F54 Galaxy F34 Galaxy F23 Galaxy F15 Galaxy F14 5G If you believe that we missed something in the list you can say so in the comment section, but make sure to provide a source for the info as well.
html:
One UI 7 is already here on the Galaxy S25 family and for many owners of older Samsung devices it’s now a matter of playing the waiting game for an update. Samsung has been pushing the release window down the road, at least as far as the Galaxy S24 generation is concerned, so we don’t really know what the release timeframe for the update looks like.

What we can do, however, is compile a list that should be fairly exhaustive for all the recent Samsung devices that are eligible to eventually get a One UI 7 update.

  • Galaxy S24 Ultra
  • Galaxy S24+
  • Galaxy S24
  • Galaxy S24 FE
  • Galaxy S23 FE
  • Galaxy S23 Ultra
  • Galaxy S23+
  • Galaxy S23
  • Galaxy S22 Ultra
  • Galaxy S22+ 5G
  • Galaxy S22 5G
  • Galaxy S21 FE
  • Galaxy S21 Ultra
  • Galaxy S21+ 5G
  • Galaxy S21+
  • Galaxy S21 5G
  • Galaxy S21
  • Galaxy Z Fold6
  • Galaxy Z Flip6
  • Galaxy Z Fold5
  • Galaxy Z Flip5
  • Galaxy Z Fold4
  • Galaxy Z Flip4
  • Galaxy Z Fold3
  • Galaxy Z Flip3
  • Galaxy A73
  • Galaxy A72
  • Galaxy A55
  • Galaxy A54
  • Galaxy A53 5G
  • Galaxy A35
  • Galaxy A34
  • Galaxy A33 5G
  • Galaxy A25
  • Galaxy A24
  • Galaxy A23
  • Galaxy A16
  • Galaxy A15 5G
  • Galaxy A15
  • Galaxy A14 5G
  • Galaxy A14
  • Galaxy A06
  • Galaxy A05s
  • Galaxy A05
  • Galaxy M55
  • Galaxy M54
  • Galaxy M53
  • Galaxy M35
  • Galaxy M34
  • Galaxy M33
  • Galaxy M15
  • Galaxy F55
  • Galaxy F54
  • Galaxy F34
  • Galaxy F23
  • Galaxy F15
  • Galaxy F14 5G

If you believe that we missed something in the list you can say so in the comment section, but make sure to provide a source for the info as well.
